Bug.Issue: Popup window does not disappear until the date is not changed
Bug.Steps: Select any dish, Go to the basket, Select a date next to the last delivery date in the menu(e.x. menu 8-11 Nov, select 15 Nov), After the pop-up «Delivery up to 14.11» appears, click on the «Change a date» button, Look at the pop-up
Bug.Expected: The popup «Delivery up to 14.11» does not appear
Bug.Actual: The popup remains until the date is not changed to the suitable one
